chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall a b : Z, verify_BezoutZ a b

Premises:
Inductive verify_BezoutZ (a b : Z) : Set := Bezout_i : forall u v : Z, addZ (multZ a u) (multZ b v) = gcdZ a b -> verify_BezoutZ a b
Inductive Z : Set := OZ : Z | pos : nat -> Z | neg : nat -> Z Arguments pos _%nat_scope Arguments neg _%nat_scope
Bezout_i : forall a b u v : Z, addZ (multZ a u) (multZ b v) = gcdZ a b -> verify_BezoutZ a b
Q = fun a : Z => forall b : Z, verify_BezoutZ a b : Z -> Set
verify_BezoutZ_rec : forall (a b : Z) (P : verify_BezoutZ a b -> Set), (forall (u v : Z) (e : addZ (multZ a u) (multZ b v) = gcdZ a b), P (Bezout_i a b u v e)) -> forall v : verify_BezoutZ a b, P v
verify_BezoutZ_sind : forall (a b : Z) (P : verify_BezoutZ a b -> SProp), (forall (u v : Z) (e : addZ (multZ a u) (multZ b v) = gcdZ a b), P (Bezout_i a b u v e)) -> forall v : verify_BezoutZ a b, P v
verify_BezoutZ_ind : forall (a b : Z) (P : verify_BezoutZ a b -> Prop), (forall (u v : Z) (e : addZ (multZ a u) (multZ b v) = gcdZ a b), P (Bezout_i a b u v e)) -> forall v : verify_BezoutZ a b, P v
verify_BezoutZ_rect : forall (a b : Z) (P : verify_BezoutZ a b -> Type), (forall (u v : Z) (e : addZ (multZ a u) (multZ b v) = gcdZ a b), P (Bezout_i a b u v e)) -> forall v : verify_BezoutZ a b, P v
gcdZ_exists : forall a b : Z, have_gcdZ a b
gcdZ_correct : forall a b : Z, is_gcdZ a b (gcdZ a b)
divZ : forall a b : Z, b <> OZ -> diveuclZ a b
divexZ : forall a b q r : Z, is_diveuclZ a b q r -> diveuclZ a b
gcdZ_is_gcdZ : forall a b d : Z, is_gcdZ a b d -> d = gcdZ a b
gcdZ_i : forall a b x : Z, is_gcdZ a b x -> {x : Z | is_gcdZ a b x}
gcdZ_is_gcd : forall a b d : Z, is_gcdZ a b d -> is_gcd Z IdZ multZ OZ a b d
gcd_modZ : forall a b q r : Z, b <> OZ -> is_diveuclZ a b q r -> gcdZ r b = gcdZ b a
unicity_is_gcdZ : forall a b d1 d2 : Z, is_gcdZ a b d1 -> is_gcdZ a b d2 -> d2 = d1
gcd_mod : forall b a d q r : Z, b <> OZ -> is_diveuclZ a b q r -> is_gcdZ r b d -> is_gcdZ b a d
positive_is_gcdZ : forall a b d : Z, is_gcdZ a b d -> leZ OZ d
P = fun a : Z => forall b : Z, have_gcdZ a b : Z -> Set
Inductive is_gcdZ : Z -> Z -> Z -> Prop := gcd_OZ : forall b : Z, is_gcdZ OZ b (absZ b) | gcd_mod : forall b a d q r : Z, b <> OZ -> is_diveuclZ a b q r -> is_gcdZ r b d -> is_gcdZ b a d
Znumtheory.Zis_gcd_sym : forall a b d : BinNums.Z, Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b d -> Znumtheory.Zis_gcd b a d
Inductive diveuclZ (a b : Z) : Set := divexZ : forall q r : Z, is_diveuclZ a b q r -> diveuclZ a b
Zdiv.Z_div_mod_eq : forall a b : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.gt b BinNums.Z0 -> a = BinInt.Z.add (BinInt.Z.mul b (BinInt.Z.div a b)) (BinInt.Z.modulo a b)
is_gcdZ_sind : forall P : Z -> Z -> Z -> SProp, (forall b : Z, P OZ b (absZ b)) -> (forall b a d q r : Z, b <> OZ -> is_diveuclZ a b q r -> is_gcdZ r b d -> P r b d -> P b a d) -> forall z z0 z1 : Z, is_gcdZ z z0 z1 -> P z z0 z1
is_gcdZ_ind : forall P : Z -> Z -> Z -> Prop, (forall b : Z, P OZ b (absZ b)) -> (forall b a d q r : Z, b <> OZ -> is_diveuclZ a b q r -> is_gcdZ r b d -> P r b d -> P b a d) -> forall z z0 z1 : Z, is_gcdZ z z0 z1 -> P z z0 z1
diveuclZ_sind : forall (a b : Z) (P : diveuclZ a b -> SProp), (forall (q r : Z) (i : is_diveuclZ a b q r), P (divexZ a b q r i)) -> forall d : diveuclZ a b, P d
diveuclZ_ind : forall (a b : Z) (P : diveuclZ a b -> Prop), (forall (q r : Z) (i : is_diveuclZ a b q r), P (divexZ a b q r i)) -> forall d : diveuclZ a b, P d
diveuclZ_rec : forall (a b : Z) (P : diveuclZ a b -> Set), (forall (q r : Z) (i : is_diveuclZ a b q r), P (divexZ a b q r i)) -> forall d : diveuclZ a b, P d
diveuclZ_rect : forall (a b : Z) (P : diveuclZ a b -> Type), (forall (q r : Z) (i : is_diveuclZ a b q r), P (divexZ a b q r i)) -> forall d : diveuclZ a b, P d
diveucl_rec : forall (a b : nat) (P : diveucl a b -> Set), (forall (q r : nat) (g : b > r) (e : a = q * b + r), P (divex a b q r g e)) -> forall d : diveucl a b, P d
gcd_unicity_apart_sign : forall a b d1 d2 : Z, is_gcd Z IdZ multZ OZ a b d1 -> is_gcd Z IdZ multZ OZ a b d2 -> d2 = d1 \/ d2 = oppZ d1

```coq
unfold Q. intros a. induction a as [|n|m]; try reflexivity.
- apply verify_BezoutZ_rect with (P := fun v => P v).
  intros u v e. apply Bezout_i.
- apply verify_BezoutZ_rect with (P := fun v => P v).
  intros u v e. apply Bezout_i.
Qed.
